text:
Visio Conferencing: Major UX/UI improvements across all platforms, including Join/Leave/Rejoin calls, use app and Return to calls, Zoom on shared screens, Horizontal mode, memorise visio backgrounds.
Parallel Calls: Ability to run multiple calls simultaneously using ONE single account on different devices.
Message Co-Edition with attachments.
Uploads: Attach up to 30 items per message.
Bold Text: Use ** before and after text to highlight it as bold.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements.

View-Only Sharing with Watermarks on Images & PDFs: Major feature preventing picture-taking on highly confidential items. Screenshots are already disabled.
Privately share your Secret Phrase with an IT Administrator during Sign Up or when required: 1st step toward the upcoming Admin Console.
Bug Fixes & Other UX/UI Improvements.
